channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter BIn Request, 4th February
item.description:
Requesting for litter bin to be installed near to bus stop as littering in area happening by people waiting for buses.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southborough Lane, Southborough, Greater London

item.title: Commercial van parked on road for months, 4th February
item.description:
Small van with ‘My Party Store’ company details on the side has been parked on the road for months, having never been moved. It’s at the top of the road on the left hand side with the rear wheels outside of the marked bays.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stanmore Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 7 piles of dog waste, 4th February
item.description:
I reported this earlier and had email to say was fixed! IT IS NOT FIXED! On Linsey Street, outside our school, there are 7 piles of dog waste, the same as I reported earlier today. I walked 50 steps and photographed all 7, if you really want to see!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Linsey Street, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous falling tree branches, 4th February
item.description:
A lot of falling branches from multiple tress alongside lawn road, especially during strong winds. Dangerous for pedestrians walking on the pavement and can cause damage to parked cars.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lawn Road, New Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping by tree outside number 3 the avenue, 4th February
item.description:
Resident of avenue road has called to state the lady with dementia on this road has left her bags of rubbish by the tree outside number 3 again. She stated she does this often and the men know about this issue by now so if it can please be collected.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Avenue, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Streetlight shining directly into basement flat bedroom, 4th February
item.description:
The streetlight outside number 76 Forest Road is very bright and shines directly into the basement bedroom (76A). This is causing disruption to our sleep. Please could a shield be installed onto the streetlight or the light be dimmed?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Forest Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Man hole cover now completely open, 4th February
item.description:
I took this photo a few days ago and forgot to report it. The pavement cover has completely fallen in, someone has put an old cupboard door over the hole but it is SO dangerous on a very busy corner right near a primary school

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oaks Avenue, West Norwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Regular litter issues on Hazelbourne Road, 4th February
item.description:
Dear Officers Thank you for your help and support. Hazelbourne Road does need more attention for sweeping and cleaning. More so than other roads if possible?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hazelbourne Road, Clapham, Greater London
